preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 100 g of bismuth using an analytical balance.
2. Weigh 50 g of cesium using the same balance.
3. Weigh 20 g of gallium.
4. Weigh 20 g of rubidium. 
5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
6. Use a spatula to mix the components thoroughly until a uniform mixture is achieved.
